components.name: Frontend
components.description: Single Page Application developed using React and TypeScript for user interface.

components.name: User Service
components.description: Manages user authentication and profile management.

components.name: Product Service
components.description: Handles catalog and inventory management for products.

components.name: Order Service
components.description: Responsible for processing and fulfilling customer orders.

components.name: Payment Service
components.description: Integrates with payment gateways for processing transactions.

data_flows.description: User authentication requests are sent from the frontend to the User Service.
Product information requests are sent from the frontend to the Product Service.
Order placement requests are sent from the frontend to the Order Service.
Order processing requests are sent from the Order Service to the Payment Service for transaction handling.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates user data management from other services.

trust_boundaries.name: Payment Processing Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates payment processing from other services.
